home.hero-subtitle: Enjoy a unique experience in Búzios with personalized service and comfort, endorsed by our guests.

reviews.name: Eduardo
reviews.text: The hosts are excellent and provided full attention and support. The breakfast is very good!

reviews.name: Leli
reviews.text: Very nice place, warm and family-friendly atmosphere. The breakfast was very abundant. The hosts are always attentive.

reviews.name: Daniel
reviews.text: Everything was perfect, from the very attentive hosts concerned about guests’ comfort, to the cleanliness of the place. The setup is very nice and the good air conditioning along with a delicious breakfast is much appreciated.

reviews.name: Patrícia
reviews.text: Excellent attention, very attentive, delicious breakfast, close to the beach (2 minutes). Spacious room. It was great and I recommend it.

reviews.name: Armand
reviews.text: We really liked it! A very attentive family and an excellent breakfast.

reviews.name: Victor
reviews.text: Truly a unique experience. So far the best hosts I’ve had. Very willing to help. Breakfast was also spectacular. Honestly 100% recommendable. I would come back gladly.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.description: At our inn, a complete experience awaits you with fresh tropical fruits, homemade breads and cakes, natural juices, and Brazilian coffee. <bold>We are the only</bold> accommodation in Búzios offering <bold>gluten-free breakfasts</bold> so you can start your day with flavor and peace of mind, in a relaxed environment and free from cross-contamination.

bedroom.title: Bedrooms
bedroom.description: Our rooms combine comfort and tropical style, with sea views, cozy beds, and warm decoration. Every space is designed to make your stay relaxing and memorable.
